source_code.description:
User Guidance: The source code being translated
into a Standard Concept.

source_concept_id.description:
User Guidance: A foreign key to the Source
Concept that is being translated
into a Standard Concept.

ETL Conventions: This is either 0 or should be a number above 2 billion, which are the Concepts reserved for site-specific codes and mappings.

source_vocabulary_id.description:
User Guidance: A foreign key to the
VOCABULARY table defining the
vocabulary of the source code that
is being translated to a Standard
Concept.

source_code_description.description:
User Guidance: An optional description for the
source code. This is included as a
convenience to compare the
description of the source code to
the name of the concept.

target_concept_id.description:
User Guidance: The target Concept
to which the source code is being
mapped.

target_vocabulary_id.description: User Guidance: The Vocabulary of the target Concept.

valid_start_date.description:
User Guidance: The date when the mapping
instance was first recorded.

valid_end_date.description:
User Guidance: The date when the mapping
instance became invalid because it
was deleted or superseded
(updated) by a new relationship.
Default value is 31-Dec-2099.

invalid_reason.description: User Guidance: Reason the mapping instance was invalidated. Possible values are D (deleted), U (replaced with an update) or NULL when valid_end_date has the default value.
